oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hymns At Twilight - Unknown date - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: WSM program Hymns At Twilight, part 1. Broadcast date unknown, possibly 1939-04-16 based on reverse of disc content (unconfirmed). Featuring the Sacred Quartet of Margaret Ackerman (soprano), Martha Murphy (contralto), Claude Sharpe (tenor), and Ovid Collins (baritone), with Miss Frank Hollowell (organ).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Sacred Quartet; Miss Frank Hollowell
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Theme (Softly Now The Light Of Day) (Sacred Quartet) -- Opening statement -- Blessed Assurance (Sacred Quartet) -- Announcer talks -- Take Time To Be Holy (Sacred Quartet) -- Announcer talks -- Beautiful Valley Of Eden (Sacred Quartet) -- Announcer talks -- I Know Whom I Have Believed (Sacred Quartet) -- Announcer introduces Miss Frank Hollowell -- Just As I Am (Miss Frank Hollowell organ) -- Announcer reads the thought for the day
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Hymns at twilight (Radio program); Ackerman, Margaret Rich; Sharpe, Claude, 1902-1969; Collins, Ovid; Hollowell, Frank
